author: SteveL-MSFT
body: The code currently makes separate WMI calls each time it needs a property.  Each call is relatively expensive.  Since the data doesn't appear to be transient, the test should cache the instance and reuse it.

comments.author: jeffbi
comments.body: It does cache it. The Get-CimClassPropVal function calls the Get-CimClass function, which caches each instance into $cimClassList.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @jeffbi I should have looked at more of the code, you're right

title: Get-ComputerInfo.Tests.ps1 should cache the WMI instances
